name: Island Merchant
description:
Become part of the United Islands Merchant Marine

Embark on a shakey journey through the seas while keeping your precious boxy wares on your boat with your crane (and ship) piloting skills.

How to play

At the start of each level you have some time on the docks to load up your ship with boxes ( you may need to swing the crane to get to the boxes farther away). Be careful to watch the weight balance to avoid sinking your ship.

Once the time is up on the docks, the ship will depart and you’ll be tasked with facing the open seas while keeping the cargo balanced.

Golden Boxes are heavier, so they will unbalance the ship quicker, but they give you extra points.

To control the crane or the ship just go up the stairs and get close to the control panel or the steering wheel.

Controls

Walking controls:

  • Move with W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys
  • Grab boxes with Space

Crane controls:

  • Rotate crane with A/D or Left/Right
  • Pull up/down the claw with W/S or Up/Down
  • Grab boxes automatically, release them with Space
  • Exit with Tab

Ship controls:

  • Move sideways with A/D or Left/Right
  • Exit with Tab
